attributes.action: make it illegal for companies to approach pensioners to sell there financial products to them
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Pensioners are aproached in stores and on the phone to sign up for store and credit cards these people are often hard of hearing and have poor sight, there should be no need for any company to profit out of the people that have spent there lives making this country the way it is we must make a stand on this a good percentage of pensioners don't have an income apart from there pension but still these companies sign them up to get them in debt, If a pensioner wants a store/credit card they can aproach the company not the other way round.
